SELECT id, status, actual_start_time,planned_next_time, execute_result,object_version_number FROM asgard_quartz_task_instance WHERE task_id = #{taskId} ORDER BY CREATION_DATE DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id, status, task_name AS taskName, exception_message, planned_start_time , actual_start_time, actual_last_time, planned_next_time FROM asgard_quartz_task_instance WHERE 1 = 1
AND task_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{taskName}),'%')
AND status LIKE concat(concat('%',#{status}),'%')
AND exception_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{exceptionMessage}),'%')
AND fd_level = #{level}
AND source_id = #{sourceId}
AND( task_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR exception_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR status LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )

SELECT aqti.id, aqti.execute_method AS method, aqti.execute_params, aqti.instance_lock, aqti.object_version_number, aqt.execute_strategy, aqt.user_details AS user_details_json, aqti.task_id FROM asgard_quartz_task_instance aqti INNER JOIN asgard_quartz_task aqt on aqt.id = aqti.task_id WHERE aqti.status = 'RUNNING' AND aqti.execute_method = #{method}
mapper.update: UPDATE asgard_saga_task_instance SET instance_lock = NULL, object_version_number = object_version_number + 1 WHERE instance_lock = #{instance} AND status = 'RUNNING'
